trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_SEQ_00<tab>Diminutive kobolds are wreaking great chaos at the Grey Fleet.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_SEQ_01<tab>Loetrswys seeks to enlist the aid of the Red Rooster Stead by contacting Moegramm.

TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_SEQ_02<tab>On hearing of Loetrswys's woes, Moegramm asks you to help send a missive to Ostfyr at the La Thagran Checkpoint. Broenruht can provide you with guidance through Blind Iron Mines, so that you may reach La Thagran in time.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_SEQ_03<tab>Broenruht informs you that the mine's inhabitants keep mostly to themselves, and that the route to La Thagran is relatively safe.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_SEQ_04<tab>On reading the report, Ostfyr fears for Summerford Farms, and asks that you inform Staelwyrn of the kobold threat.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_SEQ_05<tab>Staelwyrn has been more concerned with the Sahagin menace of late, but takes Ostfyr's warning to heart out of respect.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_TODO_00<tab>Speak to Moegramm.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_TODO_01<tab>Speak to Broenruht.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the report on kobolds to Ostfyr.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_TODO_03<tab>Speak to Staelwyrn.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_LOETRSWYS_000_0<tab>The kobold crimes of late give us ample cause for concern.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_LOETRSWYS_000_1<tab>Yet Weitzaren is content to pass them off as mere mischief-making. He cares more for the welfare of his mills than that of his workers.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_LOETRSWYS_000_2<tab>If only my beloved, Moegramm, knew of my plight, I am certain he would leap to my rescue all the way from his post at the Red Rooster Stead.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_LOETRSWYS_000_3<tab>He often calls me his “little lamb,” and I am certain my absence could only have made his heart grow fonder.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_MOEGRAMM_000_10<tab>Indeed, the kobolds' steady incursions warrant wariness.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_MOEGRAMM_000_11<tab>And now they frighten my poor little lamb, the soul I love more than any other on two legs! We must summon the Yellowjackets at once.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_MOEGRAMM_000_12<tab>I shall pen the missive warning Ostfyr of the kobolds' advance. You must deliver it to the La Thagran Checkpoint.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_MOEGRAMM_000_13<tab>There is no time to spare. To reach the La Thagran Checkpoint, go first to Blind Iron Mines─Broenruht will guide you from there.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_BROENRUHT_000_20<tab>Bound for the La Thagran Checkpoint? You've come to the right mines.

TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_BROENRUHT_000_21<tab>You'll find most denizens of the dark will leave you be so long as you extend them the same courtesy, but kobolds can be a bit more belligerent. Still, nothing an adventurer of your venturesomeness can't handle, I suppose.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_OSTFYR_000_30<tab>They say a messenger through the mines arrives faster than the crow flies from the Stead. It is good to see you.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_OSTFYR_000_31<tab>I hadn't realized the extent of the kobold menace, but Moegramm's missive has opened my eyes.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_OSTFYR_000_32<tab>Should we fail to bolster our patrols of the La Noscean lowlands now, we stand to lose the region altogether.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_OSTFYR_000_33<tab>I have not forgotten when the kobolds sought to seize the west. 'Twould be best those there know their former nemesis has resurfaced.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_OSTFYR_000_34<tab>Though Staelwyrn no doubt remains vigilant, I would ask you to visit Summerford Farms and remind him that sleeping dogs may not be content to lie.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_STAELWYRN_000_40<tab>Ostfyr's prudence befits his post. The watchman's always seen threats far over the horizon.

TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_STAELWYRN_000_41<tab>Which is all well and good, but the Sahagin swarmin' at our gates demand my immediate attention before ugly heads that haven't reared themselves in recent memory.
TEXT_SUBSEA074_00486_STAELWYRN_000_42<tab>Still, I know better than to disregard the biddin' of the Yellowjackets.
